page.description: Decode (from string) binary data using UUEncode scheme (64 bits).

argument.name: encode_string
argument.description: A text string created by the UUENCODE()function. Character

page.discussion: UUDECODE() creates binary (blob) data by decoding a text string encoded by the UUENCODE() function. UUENCODE() and UUDECODE() are typically used to send binary files through email.
